error.name_exists: This device name is already in use, please choose a different one.
error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the server. Please check the Baud Rate and port.

user.title: Connect to Smart 2000 USB Sensor
user.description: Enter the device name, Port, Baudrate and specify which PGNs to include or exclude. For best performance only use the PGNs that you wish to use. You can always update this later.

success.title: Connection Successful
success.description: You have successfully connected to Smart 2000 USB Sensor.

init.title: Configure Smart 2000 USB Sensor
init.description: Specify the Port, Baudrate and which PGNs to include or exclude. For best performance only use the PGNs that you wish to use.
